item.title: Create a resume with JSON Resume
item.description: Install resume-cli tool npm install -g resume-cli Create a new resume.json file resume init Validate resume.json to ensure it adheres to the schema resume validate Export your resume to HTML or PDF with themes resume export --format <type> --theme <theme-name> Serve your resume.json locally resume serve --theme <theme-name> To host your resume online, create a Gist on GitHub named resume.json and point to http://registry.jsonresume.org/<your-github-username>.
